name: rainbow-js
description: The Arc programming language, reimplemented in Java, then ported to JavaScript.

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-closure: google-closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js src/web/index-first.js --js src/rainbow.js --js src/web/index-last.js --js_output_file test/index-min.js
